item.title: What I wish to know about health, money and time
item.description: What would you do of your $1+ million dollar sitting in your bank account or index funds in your dying bed? There is something wrong with all those financial guru I keep seeing, they focus only on accumulating wealth, instead of what truely matters: hapiness. We end up sometimes with some situations so absurd with people drinking the kool-aids, and starts being so frugal they also forget to live in order to get that early retirement.
